DEBATE-SPEECH.TEXT: The next item is the debate on the report by Mrs Grossetête on the proposal for a regulation of the European Parliament and of the Council on medicinal products for paediatric use and amending Regulation (EEC) No 1768/92, Directive 2001/83/EC and Regulation (EC) No 726/2004 (COM(2004)0599 – C6-0159/2004 – 2004/0217(COD)) ( A6-0247/2005 ).
